subject: Mental Health
title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
description: A quick, practical guide to Cognitive Behavioral Therapy.

hook.text: What if the most effective anxiety treatment involves no medication at all?

buildup.text: CBT teaches you to identify and challenge the distorted thoughts behind fear.

discovery.text: By changing how you interpret a situation, the emotional response shifts too.

twist.text: CBT works as well as medication for most anxiety disorders with lasting results.

punchline.text: Rewire the thought, and the feeling follows.
